Title: eOfficeAACS
Description: eOffice is an open source access control and attendance management system developed by e-bird Innovation (www.ebirdinfo.com).Its flexible design allows to add support to any RF card and finger print based access control systems
HomeWiki:
eOffice Attendance and Access Control Software

eOffice is a simple and easy to use time and attendance management software which support proximity readers and finger print readers. It provides lot of ready to use reports and can be easily customizable to meet user requirements.

* Easy to use
* Easy to Install
* Easy to customize
* Open Source
